name: Scoop Up
text: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play and return its Basic Pokémon card to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

effect.text: Choose 1 of your Pokémon in play and return its Basic Pokémon card to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

strengths: Save damaged Pokemon from being KO'd
synergies: Alakazam - Move damage then Scoop Up
counters: Fast KO attacks before Scoop Up can be used

competitiveHistory: Scoop Up was essential in Damage Swap decks with Alakazam, allowing players to move damage to a Pokemon then Scoop Up to effectively heal.

rulings.ruling: You can choose any of your Pokemon in play (Active or Benched).
Only the Basic Pokemon card goes to your hand. All other cards (evolutions, energy, etc.) are discarded.
If you Scoop Up your Active Pokemon, you must promote a new Active from your Bench.
